function	script	MvPBox6	{
	setarray .BoxItems[0],19521,31087,31488,31095,19964,31476,31318,19814,31097,31029,20153,31118,20230,20273,20399,20299,31505,31179,31030,19794,31518,31098,31099,31100,31101,31102,31103,31395,31396,31398,31399,20491,31392,31394,31167,20031,19649,31509,31027,31472,19989,19521,31087,31488,31095,31097,31098,31099,31100,31101,31102,31103,31498,19720,20054,20233,19649,31456,20111,31375,31080,20161,19642,20110,20361,19589,31298,20468,20026,31170,31398,31106,20215,19588,19919,19803,20421,19828,20317,19772,20311,19938,20009,20380,20100,19808,19535,19852,20439,20044,19960,31297,31213,20495,31104,31234,20207,20218,31253,31376,20293,19701,20097,31086,31148,31147,31145,31180,31183,31195,31202,31404,31410,19956,20080,19983,31088,19575,20131,20022,19544,31216,31190,19997,19996,31412,19793,19655,19521,19935,31211,20196,31114,20071,20083,31207,20319,20115,31303,20279,20228,20040,20217,20116,19557,20183,19689,20402,19550,31053,20470,19542,20147,20396,20300,20278,31415,19760,31289,20338,20221,20177,20073,20041,20035,31133,31293,20051,20095,31449,19949,31311,20126,20201,20375,19826,20155,19746,20195,31094,20329,19666,31436,20047,19726,31212,31206,20320,20104,20141,20025,31181,20219,20312,20347,19581,20204,20117,19970,31441,20176,31158,20451,19821,31301,20465,20499,19780,20283,31543,31569,31179,20380,31456,19665,20136,20135,19884,31314,19669,19706,19729,19725,19718,19761,19755,19800,19724;

	getitem .BoxItems[ rand( .Random ) ], 1;
	end;
